H0.text: Which film star is the title of a 1984 hit single by Madness. Michael Caine

H1.text: Which film star is the title of a 1984 hit single by Madness. Charlie Chaplin

H3.text: Which film star is the title of a 1984 hit single by Madness. Cained

A4.text: Caine provided vocal samples for the ska-pop band Madness for their 1984 song 'Michael Caine'

A5.text: Caine released a compilation CD, Cained, in 2007 on the UMTV record label
